title: France panorama. [No. 73/10]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Experiments in traffic control. 2. Technological improvements in aids for the physically handicapped. 3. Integrated and solid state technology. 4. City planning operations. 5. A mobile library at Lyon. 6. The annual Buffett Art Exhibition. 7. Picasso at 91.
